about_the_game:
Soul of Roses is a 2D rogue light action game.
Absorb the abilities of your enemies, fight, die, revive, and repeat as you progress through the story.

What is Gregory House?

It is a hotel in another dimension where souls who have not been satisfied in the real world arrive.
The inhabitants of this world all release their desires and live their lives as they please.
At Gregory House, “strength of thought” is everything.
Even if your body perishes, you can reject death as long as your heart is not broken.
It is the same for the other residents.
Therefore, it is safe to beat up the residents.

The Battle to Regain Memory.

Gregory House is in trouble when it is attacked by runaway zombies.
You awoke as one of the zombies, unable to remember even your own name.
Gregory, the caretaker of Gregory House, offers you a contract.
If you will restore peace to Gregory House, I will help you regain your memory.
Your battle to restore peace to Gregory House and to regain your own memories begins.

Transform with the Soul Taker!

Take the souls of your enemies with the Soul Taker, a mysterious device embedded in your hand.
By eating the souls you take, you can transform into a soul style that reflects your opponent's abilities!
There are as many souls as there are enemies, so you are sure to find the perfect soul style for you.

Diverse battle styles!

Find your own way of fighting by combining “Memory” and “Soul Style” to strengthen yourself!

LOCAL CO-OP!

Play with a friend in the two-player co-op mode!
Fight your enemies together in local co-op or online using the Steam's Remote Play Together feature.

Lots of fun inhabitants!

Many colorful, cute, and slightly funny inhabitants appear!
Have fun chatting with them and eating their souls.
